languages.text: "О, думаю, ты смогла бы. В тебе есть и золотой свет, и серебряный, и алый — один из них позвал бы тебя обратно в этот мир".
"I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."
languages.original_text: "О, думаю, ты смогла бы. В тебе есть и золотой свет, и серебряный, и алый — один из них позвал бы тебя обратно в этот мир".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “不会的，你的身体散发着许多颜色的光芒：金色、银色、深红色……总有一种颜色会唤醒你，让你重新回到这个世界。”
languages.original_text: "I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."

traits.locale_text: “噢，不会的。你的身体散发着许多颜色的光芒：金色、银色、深红色……总有一种颜色会唤醒你，让你重新回到这个世界。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « À mon avis, vous vous en sortiriez très bien. L'une de vos propres nuances, la dorée, l'argentée ou l'écarlate, vous ramènerait dans ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, à mon avis, vous vous en sortiriez très bien. L'une de vos propres nuances, la dorée, l'argentée ou l'écarlate, vous ramènerait dans ce monde. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich denke, Ihr kämt schon zurecht. Ihr tragt verschiedene Töne des Lichts in Euch — Gold, Silber und Purpur. Einer davon möchte Euch zurück zu dieser Welt rufen."
languages.original_text: "I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, ich glaube, Ihr kämet schon zurecht. Ihr tragt verschiedene Töne des Lichts in Euch — Gold, Silber und Purpur. Einer davon möchte Euch zurück zu dieser Welt rufen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたなら何とかなりますよ。あなたは自分の中にさまざまな色合いの光を持っている…金、銀、真紅…そのうちの1つがあなたをこの世界に呼び戻してくれるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、あなたなら何とかなりますよ。あなたは自分の中にさまざまな色合いの光を持っているーー金、銀、真紅ーーそのうちの1つがあなたをこの世界に呼び戻してくれるでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Yo creo que se las apañaría. Tiene en su interior numerosos tonos de luz: dorada, plateada y carmesí. Alguno de ellos le haría volver a este mundo».
languages.original_text: "I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."

traits.locale_text: «Yo creo que se las apañaría. Tiene en su interior numerosos tonos de luz: dorada, plateada y carmesí. Alguno de ellos le haría volver a este mundo».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."

languages.text: "Yok, bence sorun yaşamazsın. İçinde ışığın binbir tonu var: Altın, gümüş, kızıl... İçlerinden biri seni bu dünyaya geri çeker."
languages.original_text: "I think you would manage. You have different hues of light within you — gold, silver, and crimson — one of them would call you back to this world."

traits.locale_text: "Yok, bence sorun yaşamazsın. İçinde ışığın bin bir tonu var: Altın, gümüş, kızıl... İçlerinden biri seni bu dünyaya geri çeker."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
